title: modernist block typefaces - ?
content:
They are both quite similar but certainly not the same.

Note: Image1 - Its the type in blue.

Any ideas anyone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/typophile.com/files/1_3.png) | 574.37 KB |
| [2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/typophile.com/files/2_14.jpg) | 42.25 KB |

 [‹ font id pleeez](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47945 "Go to previous forum topic") [NEED HELP identifying a font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47933 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Arran

comments.content: The second sample looks like Aaux Pro Ultra.

Great, that looks like the one, thanks.  
Anyone have any idea on no.1?

Hi Arran,

your image has the answer:

It seems to be a custom font called [ZHdK Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/hi-web.ch/web2_files/fonts/fonts_1.htm), made by [Hi-Visuelle Gestaltung](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/hi-web.ch/) (Megi Zumstein & Claudio Barandun), Luzern/Switzerland for [Zürcher Hochschule der Künste](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122050251/http:/www.zhdk.ch/) (ZHdK; Zurich University of the Arts) in 2007.  
F
Thanks Florian, that was a tad silly of me i must admit... The screengrab was an old one, so hadnt looked at the site for a while! Thanks
